ko_topic: 사람의 창조와 타락, 하나님이 구원을 약속하심
en_topic: Genesis answers two big questions: “How did God’s relationship with the world begin?” and “Where did the nation of Israel come from?”

ko_topic: 이스라엘 민족이 이집트 노예에서 홍해를 건너 광야로 이동한 이야기
en_topic: God saves Israel from slavery in Egypt, and then enters into a special relationship with them.

ko_topic: 레위 지파의 제사와 성막, 율법에 관한 책
en_topic: God gives Israel instructions for how to worship Him.

ko_topic: 시내산에서 가나안 정복까지, 40년간의 광야 생활에 관한 이야기
en_topic: Israel fails to trust and obey God, and wanders in the

ko_topic: 가나안 입국 전, 이스라엘의 생활중 하나님의 율법을 따름
en_topic: Moses gives Israel instructions (in some ways, a recap of the laws in Exodus–Numbers) for how to love and obey God in the Promised Land.

ko_topic: 여호수아의 가나안땅 정복의 역사
en_topic: Joshua (Israel’s new leader) leads Israel to conquer the Promised land, then parcels out territories to the twelve tribes of Israel.

ko_topic: 이스라엘 백성들의 300년간의 가나안 정착사
en_topic: Israel enters a cycle of turning from God, falling captive to oppressive nations, calling out to God, and being rescued by leaders God sends their way (called “judges”).

ko_topic: 혼란한 사사 시대에 있었던 한 가정의 이야기
en_topic: Two widows lose everything, and find hope in Israel—which leads to the birth of the future King David.

ko_topic: 사무엘, 사울의 이스라엘 통치 이야기
en_topic: Israel demands a king, who turns out to be quite a disappointment.

ko_topic: 다윗의 이스라엘 통치 이야기
en_topic: David, a man after God’s own heart, becomes king of Israel.

ko_topic: 솔로몬이, 다윗이 염원하던 성전을 건축하고, 이스라엘을 통치한 이야기
en_topic: The kingdom of Israel has a time of peace and prosperity under King Solomon, but afterward splits, and the two lines of kings turn away from God.

ko_topic: 북 왕국의 앗시리아에 의한 멸망과 남 왕국의 바빌로니아에 멸망하기 까지
en_topic: Both kingdoms ignore God and his prophets, until they both fall captive to other world empires.

ko_topic: 이스라엘 족속들의 계보를 중심으로 역사를 기록함
en_topic: This is a brief history of Israel from Adam to David, culminating with David commissioning the temple of God in Jerusalem.

ko_topic: 솔로몬의 이스라엘 통치 이야기
en_topic: David’s son Solomon builds the temple, but after centuries of rejecting God, the Babylonians take the southern Israelites captive and destroy the temple.

ko_topic: 이스라엘 백성들의 귀국과 스룹바벨에 의한 성전 건축, 율법정착
en_topic: The Israelites rebuild the temple in Jerusalem, and a scribe named Ezra teaches the people to once again obey God’s laws.

ko_topic: 적들의 방해에도 불구하고, 불에 탄 예루살렘 성곽을 재건함
en_topic: The city of Jerusalem is in bad shape, so Nehemiah rebuilds the wall around the city.

ko_topic: 이스라엘을 향한 하나님의 은밀하신 보호하심
en_topic: Someone hatches a genocidal plot to bring about Israel’s extinction, and Esther must face the emperor to ask for help.

ko_topic: 인간의 한계성과 하나님께서 거룩한 사람을 다루는 목적
en_topic: Satan attacks a righteous man named Job, and Job and his friends argue about why terrible things are happening to him.

ko_topic: 하나님을 향한 찬미와 기쁨의 찬양
en_topic: A collection of 150 songs that Israel sang to God (and to each other)—kind of like a hymnal for the ancient Israelites.

ko_topic: 인생의 지혜는 여호와를 경외하는 것
en_topic: A collection of sayings written to help people make wise decisions that bring about justice.

ko_topic: 인생을 지으신 창조주를 기억하지 않으면, 모든 것이 헛됨
en_topic: A philosophical exploration of the meaning of life—with a surprisingly nihilistic tone for the Bible.

ko_topic: 솔로몬과 술람미 여인과의 사랑의 노래
en_topic: A love song (or collection of love songs) celebrating love, desire, and marriage.

ko_topic: 이스라엘 남북 왕국, 60년 동안 활동한 이사야의 예언
en_topic: God sends the prophet Isaiah to warn Israel of future judgment—but also to tell them about a coming king and servant who will “bear the sins of many.”

ko_topic: 몰락 직전에 있는 조국을 구출하려고 눈물로 회개를 촉구함
en_topic: God sends a prophet to warn Israel about the coming Babylonian captivity, but the people don’t take the news very well.

ko_topic: 하나님의 거룩한 성과 백성에 대한 예레미야의 슬픔과 사랑의 표현
en_topic: A collection of dirges lamenting the fall of Jerusalem after the Babylonian attacks.

ko_topic: BC 597년 포로로 잡혀간 제사장 에스겔, 바빌로니아에서 받은 예언을 기록함
en_topic: God chooses a man to speak for Him to Israel, to tell them the error of their ways and teach them justice: Ezekiel.

ko_topic: 바빌로니아로 잡혀간 다니엘의 이야기
en_topic: Daniel becomes a high-ranking wise man in the Babylonian and Persian empires, and has prophetic visions concerning Israel’s future.

ko_topic: BC 722년 북 왕국 멸망전 40년간 활동한 호세아, 하나님의 마음에 대해 설교
en_topic: Hosea is told to marry a prostitute who leaves him, and he must bring her back: a picture of God’s relationship with Israel.

ko_topic: 이스라엘 백성들에게 재난을 선언하다.
en_topic: God sends a plague of locusts to Judge Israel, but his judgment on the surrounding nations is coming, too.

ko_topic: 유다, 이스라엘, 주변국들에 대한 하나님의 심판과 이스라엘의 회복
en_topic: A shepherd named Amos preaches against the injustice of the Northern Kingdom of Israel.

ko_topic: 에서의 후손인에돔의 멸망에 대한 예언
en_topic: Obadiah warns the neighboring nation of Edom that they will be judged for plundering Jerusalem.

ko_topic: 여호와의 구원은 이방인의 성 니느웨까지
en_topic: A disobedient prophet runs from God, is swallowed by a great fish, and then preaches God’s message to the city of Nineveh.

ko_topic: 이스라엘 대한 여호와의 책망과 이스라엘의 회복
en_topic: Micah confronts the leaders of Israel and Judah regarding their injustice, and prophecies that one day the Lord himself will rule in perfect justice.

ko_topic: 앗수르의 수도인 니느웨에 대한 여호와의 심판
en_topic: Nahum foretells of God’s judgment on Nineveh, the capital of Assyria.

ko_topic: 하나님의 의로운 심판
en_topic: Habakkuk pleads with God to stop the injustice and violence in Judah, but is surprised to find that God will use the even more violent Babylonians to do so.

ko_topic: 이스라엘과 열국에 대한 여호와의 심판과 이방인들과 이스라엘 대한 구원
en_topic: God warns that he will judge Israel and the surrounding nations, but also that he will restore them in peace and justice.

ko_topic: 여호와께서 그분의 전을 건축하기 위해 귀환한 포로들을 다루심
en_topic: The people have abandoned the work of restoring God’s temple in Jerusalem, and so Haggai takes them to task.

ko_topic: 학개와 동시대의 사람이었던 스가랴, 사로잡히었다가 귀환한 사람들에게 예언
en_topic: The prophet Zechariah calls Israel to return to God, and records prophetic visions that show what’s happening behind the scenes.

ko_topic: 포로 귀한 후 100년이 지난 뒤, 백성들의 신앙과 생활을 개선하기를 촉구하다.
en_topic: God has been faithful to Israel, but they continue to live disconnected from him—so God sends Malachi to call them out.

ko_topic: 마태, 예수 그리스도는 왕 중의 왕, 전 인류의 구세주라는 사실을 온 세상 사람들에게 전함
en_topic: This is an account of Jesus’ life, death, and resurrection, focusing on Jesus’ role as the true king of the Jews.

ko_topic: 십자가에서 돌아가신 예수를 믿는 사람은 구원을 얻음
en_topic: This brief account of Jesus’ earthly ministry highlights Jesus’ authority and servanthood.

ko_topic: 이방인들을 위한 책, 완전한 사람이고, 완전한 하나님이신 예수 그리스도
en_topic: Luke writes the most thorough account of Jesus’ life, pulling together eyewitness testimonies to tell the full story of Jesus.

ko_topic: 하나님의 아들이신 예수 그리스도
en_topic: John lists stories of signs and miracles with the hope that readers will believe in Jesus.

ko_topic: 교회 탄생의 목격자인 누가의 증언
en_topic: Jesus returns to the Father, the Holy Spirit comes to the church, and the gospel of Jesus spreads throughout the world.

ko_topic: 믿음으로 말미암아 사람이 의롭게 된다.
en_topic: Paul summarizes how the gospel of Jesus works in a letter to the churches at Rome, where he plans to visit.

ko_topic: 교회의 무질서에 대한 바울의 편지, 그리스도의 십자가는 교회안의 문제에 대한 해답
en_topic: Paul writes a disciplinary letter to a fractured church in Corinth, and answers some questions that they’ve had about how Christians should behave.

ko_topic: 바울 자신이 사도권을 변호하기 위해 쓴 편지
en_topic: Paul writes a letter of reconciliation to the church at Corinth, and clears up some concerns that they have.

ko_topic: 구원을 받는 것은 율법이 아닌 믿음으로 말미암아 된다.
en_topic: Paul hears that the Galatian churches have been lead to think that salvation comes from the law of Moses, and writes a (rather heated) letter telling them where the false teachers have it wrong.

ko_topic: 유대인과 이방인들 사이의 의견 대립, 에베소 교인들에게 교회의 단결을 호소함
en_topic: Paul writes to the church at Ephesus about how to walk in grace, peace, and love.

ko_topic: 유럽 최초의 교회, 빌립보교회에 대한 바울의 권면
en_topic: An encouraging letter to the church of Philippi from Paul, telling them how to have joy in Christ.

ko_topic: 예수 그리스도는 하나님의 형상이시고 교회의 머리되신다.
en_topic: Paul writes the church at Colossae a letter about who they are in Christ, and how to walk in Christ.

ko_topic: 데살로니가 그리스도인들에게 향한 바울의 격려, 하나님을 섬기고, 주님의 재림을 기다리는 생활
en_topic: Paul has heard a good report on the church at Thessalonica, and encourages them to “excel still more” in faith, hope, and love.

ko_topic: 주님의 재림을 대하는 그리스도인의 태도
en_topic: Paul instructs the Thessalonians on how to stand firm until the coming of Jesus.

ko_topic: 에베소를 맡은 청년 목사, 디모데에게 목회자의 자세, 교회 운영, 가정과 사회에 관하여 편지함
en_topic: Paul gives his protegé Timothy instruction on how to lead a church with sound teaching and a godly example.

ko_topic: 순교직전 바울, 믿음의 아들 디모데에게 보내는 유언장 같은 편지
en_topic: Paul is nearing the end of his life, and encourages Timothy to continue preaching the word.

ko_topic: 크레테 교회를 지도하고 있는 유능한 청년 목사 디도에게 보내는 바울의 편지
en_topic: Paul advises Titus on how to lead orderly, counter-cultural churches on the island of Crete.

ko_topic: 도망간 오네시모에 대한 용서를 구함
en_topic: Paul strongly recommends that Philemon accept his runaway slave as a brother, not a slave.

ko_topic: 구원은 율법을 지켜서가 아니라, 예수 그리스도를 믿는 믿음으로써만 된다고 유대인들에게 강조함
en_topic: A letter encouraging Christians to cling to Christ despite persecution, because he is greater.

ko_topic: 선한 사업
en_topic: A letter telling Christians to live in ways that demonstrate their faith in action.

ko_topic: 박해를 당하고 있는 교회에게
en_topic: Peter writes to Christians who are being persecuted, encouraging them to testify to the truth and live accordingly.

ko_topic: 교회안의 이단에 대한 경계
en_topic: Peter writes a letter reminding Christians about the truth of Jesus, and warning them that false teachers will come.

ko_topic: 그리스도의 참 사랑, 신성한 생명의 교통
en_topic: John writes a letter to Christians about keeping Jesus’ commands, loving one another, and important things they should know.

ko_topic: 거짓 선생에 대한 경고
en_topic: A very brief letter about walking in truth, love, and obedience.

ko_topic: 요한의 동역자가 배척
en_topic: An even shorter letter about Christian fellowship.

ko_topic: 영지주의에 대한 복음의 진리를 가지고 변증
en_topic: A letter encouraging Christians to contend for the faith, even though ungodly persons have crept in unnoticed.

ko_topic: 그리스도의 궁극적 승리, 새 예루살렘
en_topic: John sees visions of things that have been, things that are, and things that are yet to come.
